entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron was still in a bad mood with Hermione next day. He barely talked to her all through Herbology.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione asked timidly as they stripped fat pink pods from the plants and emptied the shining beans into a wooden pail.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron said Scabbers was hiding at the bottom of his bed, shaking.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry joined the line for Transfiguration next.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout cried 'Careful, Weasley, careful!' as the beans burst into bloom before their very eyes.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Harry wanted to ask Professor McGonagall after the lesson whether he could go into Hogsmeade with the rest.
